div.p: Litigation is our core-business. Our lawyers have been involved in many high-profile cases for 20 years.
Over the past years, our lawyers have gained significant experience in arbitration, both as counsel as well as arbitrators.

In mediation, the parties find a solution for their conflict, with the assistance of a mediator who has no decision-making power. The result, if mediation succeeds, is a solution which is agreeable to all parties.
